content:
EC2 Ubuntu 20.04 focal - first install failed when it said the database had not been created...so just ran the install again. the register org link is entering into a redirect loop... I don't see any error message in the second installation output. Not really an nginx expert so not entirely sure what is going on, if it is nginx. Anyway. I searched in here and didn't see anything, apologies if I missed the answer somewhere. the host is https://singularity.attakpik.com

one more thing...so, org reg goes into redir loop, but the url above in inspector shows two requests to / the first of which is blocked

you know, i think this feels like a cert error...but not entirely sure.

I just can't stop. I use cloudflare for dns, but proxy not enabled for this hostname.
This topic was moved here from #issues > redirect error self-installed by Greg Price.

@Mark Labbe: What did you pass the installer for the certificate option you wanted?

I don't see anything listening on port 443, so you may need to adjust your firewall.
I think we'd also be interested in the parts of /var/log/zulip/install.log which talk about the first failure you had, with the database.
